nodes.text: Delcourt is a French publishing house specialized in comics and manga. Founded in 1986, Delcourt is responsible for publishing the French printings of all Star Wars comics and manga since it took up Dark Horse France's job in 1999.

Since 2015, the new line of Marvel comic books based on Star Wars are published in French by another company, Panini Comics. Delcourt kept the rights to the previous comics, in addition to the comics from Star Wars Rebels Magazine.
